Играл в неё в 2012 и вроде норм.
Пару слов об игре.
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
Тут уже много раз говорили о мимике и о дубляже, так почему бы и мне не сказать?)
Мимика лиц даже у роботов превосходная, чувствуется в них особенная изюминка.
По поводу русского дубляжа? Знаете, я не ожидал такого превосходного дубляжа, честно 10\10 в плане озвучки.
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
Теперь по поводу геймплейной части и ко-оп'а:
1. Геймплей прост как вафля, чесн. Игру "тащит" буквально сюжет и мозгоёб.. кхм, прошу прощения головоломки
2. Ко-оп таков: можете поиграть и по онлайну и со своими френдами в стиме, но коли собрались покупать, то покупайте только с друзьями, ибо сингл надоест, хоть и сюдет шикарен.
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
По поводу графена и багов:
Графен на уровне 2011 года, да ещё и на сурсе действительно хорош, да вроде и багов я не встречал (хотя недочёты были)
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
Стоит ли покупать и мой балл:
Покупать стоит только по скидке и только с френдами, ибо сингл вам надоест часа через 2\3, а вот ко-оп шикарен.
8.8\10
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

While multiplayer never really took off, this game is EPIC in the 3D FPS puzzle genre, perhaps the best yet. The humor, the story, the acting - everything comes together for an unforgettable experience. The single player experience is great and if you have someone to play co-op with, then you are in for an additional treat. With community made maps on top of all that, what are you waiting for? :o)

Good story, fun puzzles, co-op. What's not to love?

Challenging, rewarding and funny all the way through! You should have played it through at least once!

I'm not saying portal is a god game, but it is a good game.
good

Honestly, great game. The puzzles are challenging without becoming overly difficult, the pacing is perfect, and new mechanics get introduced at perfect moments so it never gets dry. Additionally, it's very humerous, and the performances are top notch. Graphics are good, expesially for the time. Nothing terribly flashy though. Also runs very well on my i5 computer.

It's a great experience, don't miss out on such a masterpiece! 10/10
Stephen Merchant/10

Todo en el juego es genial:
. La manera en la que muchas preguntas que surgieron en el Portal 1 se contestan y surgen otras más
. Los villanos son clásicos, de esos que nuca olvidaras 
. Los niveles difíciles pero no llegan al punto de ser tediosos y desesperantes
. Bueno gráficamente
. Mas variedad en los escenarios 
. Muy notable esteticamente
. Las mecánicas simples pero nunca se hace repetitivo (aparecen nuevas cosas ademas de las ya vistas en P1)
. Relativamente largo (unas 8-9 horas)
. Cosas como el Cubo de compañía tendrán más relevancia que muchos villanos de juegos actuales
. Un final de los mejores con una batalla épica

Definitivamente uno de los mejores juegos de los últimos tiempos, además trae el multiplayer y cámaras hechas por la comunidad :D
One of the funniest games I have ever played : 3

I haven't had the chance to play co-op yet, but even the singleplayer story mode is a blast. A fair amount of twists and turns to keep you going... And the puzzles are fun for your brain too. You're stranded in a testing lab with 2 robot characters who will make you laugh and maybe even cry. ;) 

Suffice to say, I very much enjoy it and I'd definitely buy it again. Though I might wait for a sale.

Portal is simply one of the many great games that Valve distributes and produces. Although many consumers crave more sequals, the current titles that we have avaliable have extreme replayability. So to all who enjoy comedy, platforming and puzzel solving I highly reccomend Portal 1&2.

The gold standard for puzzle games? Looks sharp even today, and the game adds several clever mechanisms to play around with. The levels are solid quality as you would expect from Valve, most of the work in them are done by thinking, with control/timing sensitive situations used sparingly. Rarely would you feel truly stuck or needed to notice a minute detail without hints. Despite "thinking with Portal" mechanics, it is still very clear what you can or cannot do, yet it avoids feeling linear or monotonous. I wish it would've been a longer game, however there is co-op that adds even more twists (albeit with frequent loading screens), and several high quality levels in the workshop.

If you see this on sale (as it often is), buy it.
Ive already put hours and hours of gameplay on xbox 360 and i love this game! one of the best games by valve!
